description:
The Hinata family and frogs visit Grandma`s house in the countryside for o-bon vacation, but in the woods there seems to be a ghost that can become the very thing they fear. Later, Tamama is training in the mountains at Grandma`s house when he spots a turtle on its way somewhere. Throughout the day and into the night, Tamama checks on its progress until he`s rewarded with knowing the turtle`s final destination.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Visiting Grandma Hinata`s House / Tamama and the Turtle
日向家 里帰り / タママとカメ
